name: Reflective (itch)
description:
__________

Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022 Theme: Duality

__________

Description:

Switch between a bird and a fish with the goal of collecting food. You must eat golden dragonflies and tadpoles to keep your health up. So make sure to get to the food before other preditors do. Use the bird's dive ability or the fish's dash ability to get around faster. 

Eating food on the opposite side gives you more health.

__________

Controls:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Switch between bird and fish

ENTER - Dive as a bird or Dash as s fish

__________
